scripts.build: rm -rf dist && rm -rf pluginTypes && rm -rf lib && rm -rf types && npm run build:lib && npm run build:types && npm run build:dist && npm run build:cli
scripts.build:dist: rm -rf types && rm -rf bundle && rm -rf dist && tsc && node tools/bundleDist && tsc --P tsconfig.bundle.json && node tools/copyDist
scripts.build:types: rm -rf bundle && node tools/buildLib.js && tsc --P tsconfig.types.json && rm -rf bundle && rm -rf src/lib.ts && node tools/bundleLib.js
scripts.build:test: rm -rf bundle && tsc --P tsconfig.test.json && node tools/bundleTest.js && rm -rf bundle
scripts.test:solidity: rm -rf test/solidity/src && mocha --exit --require ts-node/register test/solidity.spec.ts && tsc -p test/solidity --noEmit && if diff -r test/solidity/expected test/solidity/src ; then echo "results are the same as expcted" ; else echo "results are different than the expected"; fi
